title: What time is X Factor: Celebrity on tonight? Line-up, judges and prize revealed
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

The wait is finally over as ITV singing contest The X Factor returns to screens tonight at 8:35pm with its major facelift.

Viewers will watch sporting heroes, TV personalities and reality stars step out of their comfort zones to put on the show of a lifetime for judges Simon Cowell , Louis Walsh and Nicole Scherzinger .

Tonight's series kicks off in Los Angeles, where the celebs are split into three categories; the Overs, the Unders and Groups and sing their hearts out to win a place at the live shows in London.

(Image: ITV)

Branded as a 'new take on the nation's most talked about music talent show,' the new version is a spin-off from the usual one we are used to, and will be hosted by TV favourite Dermot O’Leary.

The 14 all-star acts will fight for a chance to be crowned champion and come out with a record deals.

Simon recently spoke about his new celebrity venture: "It's time for something different."

"My credibility is at stake. If it doesn’t work I look like a total idiot. So no pressure."

(Image: PA)

Hot on the heels of BGT: The Champions, music mogul Simon managed to convince former panelists Louis and Nicole to get on board.

Louis recently said: "He didn't need to convince me."

While Nicole was also excited and revealed: "It's in my blood to do this."

Tonight viewers will watch as celebrities including Megan McKenna , Ricki Lake and the stars of Love Island sing their debut performances in a bid to secure a record contract.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: PA)

However viewers will already know that many of the famous faces set to feature on tonight's show already have record contracts and tour dates booked in.

Former Towie star Megan is set to be seen competing for The X Factor title.

However, her fans will know she quit reality TV in 2017 to focus on her new career as a country singer.

As well as having a record contract, she's released an album, Story Of Me, topped the iTunes chart and toured extensively.

Which celebrities will make it to the next round tonight?

The X Factor: Celebrity airs on ITV 12 October at 8:35pm
description: The 14 famous faces will give it their all to impress judges Simon Cowell, Louis Walsh and Nicole Scherzinger
